0: RESOLUTION CONGRATULATING AND COMMENDING DEXLER BOLAMBAO FOR WINNING THE PHILIPPINES' FIRST GOLD MEDAL IN ARNIS AT THE 30TH SOUTHEAST ASIAN GAMES

history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00690
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION CONGRATULATING AND COMMENDING DEXLER BOLAMBAO FOR WINNING THE PHILIPPINES' FIRST GOLD MEDAL IN ARNIS AT THE 30TH SOUTHEAST ASIAN GAMES
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ROMUALDEZ, YEDDA MARIE K., ROMUALDEZ, FERDINAND MARTIN G.
DATE FILED : 2020-02-04
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Scheduled for Meeting/Hearing on 2020-03-04
          -On account of the subsequent referrals of HR Nos. 679, 680 and 690, the body approved their inclusion in the preparation of the substitute resolution which seeks to commend the national athletes for their exemplary performance, as well as the organizing committee for its successful hosting of the 30th SEAGAMES. The Chairman directed the Secretariat to prepare a substitute resolution, in substitution of HR Nos. 573,596, 601, 605, 606, 608, 622, 629, 640, 679, 680 and 690, as well as its corresponding committee report.
          -Initial consideration of HR Nos. 679, 680 and 690
MOTHER BILL: HR00776
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON YOUTH AND SPORTS DEVELOPMENT ON 2020-02-05
